title: Inform Customer of a Production Delay
description: A production delay means a customer's order will be late. A sales rep needs to proactively inform the customer.

tasks.description: Identify the sales order affected by the production delay.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the relevant sales order.

tasks.description: Get the revised estimated completion date from the production planning team.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives a new ETA for the order.

tasks.description: Contact the customer, explain the situation, provide the new ETA, and apologize for the delay.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly and proactively communicates the delay to the customer.
